subject: RE: [junit] [Fwd: Re: Check class file for annotation]
msgSnippet: ... Same here - I never test private stuff, but take the desire as a hint that the design needs improvement. Cheers, Ilja
messageBody:
> Does anyone here ever go to this length of trouble to test private
> stuff?
>
> I'm curious because I'm a fan of not testing private directly, as I
> TDD code into existence and so its always tested... or if need
> to..I'll extract class, etc...

Same here - I never test private stuff, but take the desire as a hint that
the design needs improvement.

Cheers, Ilja
